title: 21 runners die after extreme weather hits ultramarathon trail in China
content:
1. 21 runners die after extreme weather hits ultramarathon trail in China  CBS News
  2. Chinese Ultramarathon: 21 Runners Dead After Extreme Weather Hits Event  The New York Times
  3. Extreme weather in China kills at least 21 in ultramarathon  Reuters
  4. China marathon: Fans mourn top runners killed in deadly race  BBC News
  5. 21 runners were killed by disastrous hail, wind, and rain that hit an ultramarathon race on a mountain in China  msnNOW
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
